comments.text:
Created attachment 8971899
Bug 1457629 - Don't create per-test-coverage-reports.zip when no tests are run.

This patch stops test-coverage (TC/TCw) from trying to create a zip file of the per-test coverage reports when no tests are run.

Review commit: https://reviewboard.mozilla.org/r/240632/diff/#index_header
See other reviews: https://reviewboard.mozilla.org/r/240632/
comments.author: gmierz2@outlook.com

comments.text: Here's a try run with no tests run in TC and TCw: https://treeherder.mozilla.org/#/jobs?repo=try&revision=d0ff3aef666b79e67acdc2b0a590c859137af842
comments.author: gmierz2@outlook.com
